title: How to Deal With Exam Stress
description: An animated video providing practical strategies for managing stress and anxiety before and during exams.

title: 10 Tools to Calm Your Anxious Mind
description: An article from 'Goodful' outlining ten actionable techniques you can use to find relief when feeling anxious.

title: Atomic Habits: How to Get 1% Better Every Day
description: A fantastic animated summary of James Clear's bestselling book on how tiny changes lead to remarkable results.

title: What Makes a Good Life? Lessons from a Long Study on Happiness
description: A powerful TED talk on the paramount importance of healthy, supportive relationships for long-term happiness and well-being.
